summary: This mod changes the moon to look like the Bat-Signal.
descriptionHtml:
Bat-Signal Moon

This mod changes the moon to look like the Bat-Signal.

==Installation==
Simply place the Textures folder into the data directory.
Load loose files just incase.

==Uninstallation==
Delete the following files:
Data\\Textures\\sky\\masser_full.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\masser_half_wan.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\masser_half_wax.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\masser_new.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\masser_one_wan.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\masser_one_wax.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\masser_three_wan
Data\\Textures\\sky\\masser_three_wax
==Credits==
Martin Purvis
author: Martin Purvis
